title: LAP: Urban Latin America, Part 2 (Spanish Version)
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editors Tom Angotti and Clara Irazábal on the subject of the March 2017 issue: "Urban Latin America: Part 2: Planning Latin American Cities: Dependencies and 'Best Practices.
